title: Balenciaga: The Master of Us All, an interview with Miren Arzalluz
itunes:title: Balenciaga: The Master of Us All, an interview with Miren Arzalluz
description:
This week Miren Arzalluz, Director of the Palais Galliera in Paris, joins us to discuss the "master of us all," Cristóbal Balenciaga.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
